title: Vice President
name: Sabrina Yu
bio: I'm Sabrina, a sophomore studying Math and Computer Science in Columbia College. I love all math that contains pretty pictures (i.e geometry and topology)!!!

title: Treasurer
name: Andrew Glover
bio: Andrew is a sophomore in Columbia College studying Math, though complex analysis is making him reconsider. Oftentimes, he can be found in a math classroom at 4 am, furiously scribbling on the chalkboards as he sips on a coffee from JJs. He spends his free time playing the piano, destroying his friends in Super Smash Bros, and going on hikes whenever he is able to.

title: Web Master
name: Nikash Das
bio: Hi! I'm Nikash from New York. When I'm not in front of a blackboard, you can find me playing volleyball, programming, or making bracelets.

title: Social Media Manager
name: Will Betts
bio: I'm William Betts, born and raised in Taipei Taiwan. In my free time I love playing baord games, watching movies, and doing anything active.
